alert.note: Alert for Paradox Valley, Lower Dolores River (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 27 at 1:27PM MDT by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern San Miguel and southwestern Montrose Counties through 200 PM MDT... At 127 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Slick Rock, or 18 miles southeast of La Sal, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Slick Rock. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
